title: /me doesn't work anymore???
body:
Just tried it, nothing happened...

Rito, please...

replies.body:
[**Riot Broporo**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/864x9o7b-chat-command-in-lobby?comment=0000) said this about the /me feature a few months ago:

_"I'm not 100% sure if this is permanent 'feature' or not, so don't be surprised if it happens to not work one day."_

So I guess that's what happened. I also imagine it was removed partly because it was being used to impersonate Riot which isn't allowed.
**/me** has only been removed in Champion Select and applicable gameplay-impacting locations. You can still use the /me command in your queue lobby and with your friends, if I'm recalling correctly.
I think I can remember someone saying that the whole /me was an unintended consequence of another change they made. So my guess would be they got around to removing it
